settings.heading: What sizes do you carry?
settings.row_content: We carry a range of sizes for men, women, and children. Please check the product page or size chart for specific information on available sizes.

settings.heading: How can I track my order?
settings.row_content: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a shipping confirmation email with a tracking number. You can also log into your account to view your order status and track your package.

settings.heading: Can I make changes to my order after it has been placed?
settings.row_content: We process and ship orders quickly, so we may not be able to make changes to your order after it has been placed. However, please contact our customer service team as soon as possible and they will assist you.

settings.heading: How can I pay for my order?
settings.row_content: We accept payments through major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and also cash on delivery in some regions.

settings.heading: How long will it take for my order to arrive?
settings.row_content: Shipping times vary depending on your location and the shipping method you choose. You can view the estimated delivery date for your order in your account or on the checkout page.

settings.heading: What is your policy on damaged or defective items?
settings.row_content: If you receive a damaged or defective item, please contact our customer service team within 14 days of receiving your order. They will assist you with a replacement or refund.

settings.heading: How do I care for my clothes?
settings.row_content: Each product has its own care instructions, which can be found on the product page or on the care label of the garment. These instructions will tell you how to best care for your clothes to ensure they last as long as possible.
